snippet: Both liberals and conservatives assault the Constitution in different ways, each with damaging effects on our nation.
abstract: Op-Ed article by J Harvie Wilkinson III, United States Court of Appeals judge, criticizes both liberals and conservatives for using the Constitution to implement their agendas, resulting in a national jurisprudence whetted by political appetite; maintains that the country faces grave risks from such lack of restraint, but finds hope in the love both sides share for family, community and country.
lead_paragraph: Both liberals and conservatives assault the Constitution in different ways, each with damaging effects on our nation.
